sentences.en: -- The people's victim and lifelong bond - slave , as they fancied her, might say to them.
sentences.cn: 人们心目中的这个牺牲品和终身奴仆会对他们这样说.

sentences.en: " There is very much slave work to be done now that the fight is over.
sentences.cn: “ 战斗既然结束了,就有好多辛苦的活儿要干呢. ”

sentences.en: He's been forced into slave labour at burger bars to earn a bit of cash.
sentences.cn: 为了挣点钱，他被迫到卖汉堡的小店里做苦工。

sentences.en: I used to love to think that I was his abject slave.
sentences.cn: 我过去常常爱把自己想成是他的卑贱的奴仆.

sentences.en: Look at them, we slave away and they play cards.
sentences.cn: 瞧瞧他们吧, 我们辛苦地劳动,而他们却在玩牌.

sentences.en: Might it not be simple just to wake up your slave girl?
sentences.cn: 要是叫醒你的丫头,不更方便 吗 ?

sentences.en: Our manager became a slave driver during the rush season.
sentences.cn: 赶定单的季节,我们的经理就变得苛刻,只晓得逼人拼命干活.

sentences.en: She looked upon him as her errand - man and humble slave.
sentences.cn: 在她看来,他不过是跑腿的佣人,低下的奴才.

sentences.en: Slave girls prepared and served his food and drink and attended to his every whim.
sentences.cn: 侍女侍候他的饮食并满足他的各种欲望.

sentences.en: The children were used as slave labour in gold mines in the jungle.
sentences.cn: 在丛林地带，儿童被用作开采金矿的苦役。

sentences.en: The report alleges that thousands of people have been forced into slave labour by the army.
sentences.cn: 该报告宣称，成千上万的人被军队逼迫做苦役。

sentences.en: The slave unit is located at the ground stations.
sentences.cn: 附属装置安装在地面台.

sentences.en: We are born to slave it for our lord.
sentences.cn: 我们是生来为君王效犬马之劳的.

sentences.en: When you're busy all day the last thing you want to do is spend hours slaving over a hot stove.
sentences.cn: 当你忙碌了一整天后，你最不愿意做的事就是花好几个钟头在灼热的火炉边辛苦地劳作。

sentences.en: Why should I slave away all my life!
sentences.cn: 我为什么要辛辛苦苦地干一辈子 呀 !

trans.tran_cn: 奴隶，…的奴隶，耽迷于…的人，奴隶般受控的人，苦工，[机]从动装置
trans.tran_en: someone who is owned by another person and works for them for no money
If you say that a person is slaving over something or is slaving for someone, you mean that they are working very hard

trans.tran_cn: 奴隶般地工作，做苦工，买卖奴隶，运输奴隶
trans.tran_en: to work very hard with little time to rest
